settings.description: Describe the video for customers using screen readers

settings.heading: Product: [ 2016+ TOYOTA TACOMA LIGHT BAR KIT ]
settings.rich_text: Installing a light bar has never been easier with our all-new Toyota Tacoma Light Bar kit. Professional racer Mike Cafro shows just how simple it is to add a massive lighting boost to your Gen 3 Tacoma by walking you through the install process step by step.

This kit features our 32" XPL low profile LED light bar that boasts over 12,000 lumens at 1,800ft. of usable lighting distance. Each kit will include your choice of a clear lens (pictured) or our new Selective yellow lens XPL light bar, mounting brackets, and a wiring harness complete with relays and rocker switch.

The heavy duty brackets are designed as a no-drill, bolt-on solution that install directly to factory mounting points. The slotted mounting holes allow for the light bar to be adjusted up or down for precise beam angle aiming.

Worried about wiring? We got you covered. The included light bar wiring harness makes powering your light bar easy. Complete with fuses, relays, and a lighted rocker switch, our harness ensures a proper connection so your light bar will never fail due to wiring issues.
Once installed, the XPL will match up perfectly to the slot opening in your Toyota Tacoma for a clean, factory like appearance.Check out the Toyota Tacoma Light Bar kit here!
